programme.title: Sporting Heroes
programme.sub-title: Sporting Heroes: Gary Newbon Interviews Naseem Hamed.
programme.desc: An interview with the former boxer, who reigned supreme in the featherweight division in the latter half of the 1990s, but came unstuck when he faced Marco Antonio Barrera. Hamed first won the WBO title in 1995 when he dethroned Steve Robinson, and also went on to claim the IBF and WBC belts before suffering the sole loss of his career to Barrera in Las Vegas in 2001, and retired after one final bout against Manuel Calvo in 2002.(n)
